data.eml:eml: A new species of Simopelta (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Ponerinae) from Brazil and Costa Rica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernandes, Itanna O., Souza, Jorge L. P., C, Fernando Fernández, Delabie, Jacques H. C., Schultz, Ted R. (2015): A new species of Simopelta (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Ponerinae) from Brazil and Costa Rica. Zootaxa 3956 (2): 295-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3956.2.10
